databaseAccess

Class ParcelDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • databaseAccess.ParcelDB

  • public class ParcelDB
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Description: Class that establishes a connection and communicates directly with the parcel table in the database.
    Author:
    Tristen Kreutz

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static java.lang.String TAX_PREPARER

      ParcelDB() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean delete(java.lang.String parcelID)
      Establishes a connection with the database and removes the Parcel from the parcel table that has a Primary Key matching the parcelID being passed into this method.
      static Parcel get(java.lang.String parcelID)
      Establishes a connection with the database and selects the Parcel in the parcel table that has a Primary Key matching the parcelID being passed into this method.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Parcel> getAll()
      Establishes a connection with the database and selects all the Parcels within the parcel table.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Parcel> getParcelsByParameter(java.lang.String parcelID, java.lang.String sender, java.lang.String receiver, java.util.Date dateSent, int year)
      Method that, using the supplied parameters, retrieves all parcels in the database with that information and returns a list to the calling program.
      static boolean insert(Parcel parcel)
      Establishes a connection with the database and inserts the Parcel object passed into this method into the parcel table.
      static boolean isVisibleToUser(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String parcelID)
      Method that, using the supplied email and parcelID, returns true if the associated user is allowed to view the aprcel associated with the ID
      static boolean update(Parcel parcel)
      Establishes a connection with the database and updates the Parcel in the parcel table that shares a Primary Key with the Parcel being passed into this method.

      • ParcelDB

        public ParcelDB()

    • Method Detail

      • insert

        public static boolean insert(Parcel parcel)
        Establishes a connection with the database and inserts the Parcel object passed into this method into the parcel table.
        Parameters:
        parcel - Parcel to insert into the database
        Returns:
        boolean based on whether or not the operation was successful

      • update

        public static boolean update(Parcel parcel)
        Establishes a connection with the database and updates the Parcel in the parcel table that shares a Primary Key with the Parcel being passed into this method. All values of the Parcel in the database will be updated with the values of the object being passed assuming constraints are not violated.
        Parameters:
        parcel - Parcel to update in the database
        Returns:
        boolean based on whether or not the operation was successful

      • delete

        public static boolean delete(java.lang.String parcelID)
        Establishes a connection with the database and removes the Parcel from the parcel table that has a Primary Key matching the parcelID being passed into this method.
        Parameters:
        parcelID - parcelID of the Parcel to remove from the database
        Returns:
        boolean based on whether or not the operation was successful

      • get

        public static Parcel get(java.lang.String parcelID)
        Establishes a connection with the database and selects the Parcel in the parcel table that has a Primary Key matching the parcelID being passed into this method.
        Parameters:
        parcelID - parcelID of the Parcel to retrieve from the database
        Returns:
        Parcel that contains the information of the requested Parcel

      • getAll

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Parcel> getAll()
        Establishes a connection with the database and selects all the Parcels within the parcel table. It then adds them to a newly created ArrayList and returns that to the calling object.
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing all of the Parcels from the database

      • getParcelsByParameter

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Parcel> getParcelsByParameter(java.lang.String parcelID,
                                                                java.lang.String sender,
                                                                java.lang.String receiver,
                                                                java.util.Date dateSent,
                                                                int year)
        Method that, using the supplied parameters, retrieves all parcels in the database with that information and returns a list to the calling program.
        Parameters:
        parcelID - parcel ID to search
        sender - sender to search
        receiver - receiver to search
        dateSent - date sent to search
        year - year to search
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing all relevant Parcels from the database

      • isVisibleToUser

        public static boolean isVisibleToUser(java.lang.String email,
                                      java.lang.String parcelID)
                               throws ConfigException
        Method that, using the supplied email and parcelID, returns true if the associated user is allowed to view the aprcel associated with the ID
        Parameters:
        email - the email to check against
        parcelID - the parcelID to check against
        Returns:
        true if email is allowed to view this parcel. false if not.
        Throws:
        ConfigException - if config file is not found or cannot be opened
